title: Sword
desc:
Post 457
-Slice a player in half. The number of cards they own is split between 2 “halves”
-Each half takes its own turn as if it was two separate players. They have their own hands and take separate turns
-one half cannot win if the other still has cards, however both halves can still hit 0 cards without winning
-Being split in half lasts for 3 rounds
